name: addneintr2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

comment: Introducing a term on the right-hand side of a sum in a negated equality. Contrapositive of ~ addcan2ad . Consequence of ~ addcan2d . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
